item.title: TPMS periodic single-cell integration simulation
item.description:
1.模型生成(mathematica) 模型方程参考https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/J1FIr99urkgp4c92-9rIRA

  1. Gyroid 方程：sin(x) cos(y) + sin(y) cos(z) + sin(z) cos(x)
  2. Schwarz (Primitive) 方程：cos(x)+cos(y)+cos(z)
  3. Diamond 方程：sin(x)*sin(y)*sin(z)+sin(x)*cos(y)*cos(z)+cos(x)*sin(y)*cos(z)+cos(x)*cos(y)*sin(z)
  4. Lidinoid 方程：sin(2x) * cos(y) * sin(z) + sin(2y) * cos(z) * sin(x) + sin(2z) * cos(x) * sin(y) - cos(2x) * cos(2y) - cos(2y) * cos(2z) - cos(2z) * cos(2*x) + 0.3
  5. Split P 方程：1.1*(sin(2x)sin(z)cos(y)+sin(2y)sin(x)cos(z)+sin(2z)sin(y)cos(x))-0.2(cos(2x)cos(2y)+cos(2y)cos(2z)+cos(2z)cos(2x))-0.4(cos(2x) + cos(2y) +cos(2*z))
  6. Neovius 方程：3*(cos(x)+cos(y)+cos(z))+4*cos(x)*cos(y)*cos(z)
  7. IWP 方程：2 (Cos[Pi/10 x] Cos[Pi/10 y] + Cos[Pi/10 y] Cos[Pi/10 z] + Cos[Pi/10 z] Cos[Pi/10 x]) - (Cos[Pi/5 x] + Cos[Pi/5 y] +Cos[Pi/5 z])
  8. Gyroid 方程：Sin[Pi/10 x] Cos[Pi/10 y] + Sin[Pi/10 y] Cos[Pi/10 z] + Sin[Pi/10 z] Cos[Pi/10 x]
  9. FRD 方程：4cos (x) cos (y) cos (z)-[cos (x) cos (2y)+ cos (2x) cos (2z)+ cos (2y) cos (2z)]

这里以Dimond模型为例子展示实现方法： Shell type: Solid type: Sandwich type:
